metadata.title: Special BBQ Restriction Areas
metadata.description: Specific areas within Berlin with special grilling restrictions

properties.name: Grunewald Forest
properties.title: Forest Fire Protection Zone
properties.description: BBQ strictly prohibited in all forest areas due to fire hazard.
properties.details: The Grunewald forest is a protected area with high fire risk, especially during dry seasons. Open flames and BBQs are strictly forbidden.
properties.alternative_suggestion: Use designated BBQ areas at nearby Schlachtensee or in urban parks.

properties.name: Naturschutzgebiet Karower Teiche
properties.title: Nature Protection Area
properties.description: Protected wetland area - BBQ and open fires prohibited.
properties.details: This nature reserve protects important wetland habitats. All recreational fires including BBQs are forbidden to protect wildlife.
